p: The important antioxidant activity of the methanolic extract of Thymus leptobotrys to the DPPH and ABTS radical could be explained by its richness in phenolic compounds. There is indeed a correlation between the antioxidant activity and content of phenolic compounds [ 31– 33]. On the other hand, many studies have reported that phenolic compounds are often known by their antioxidant activity [ 34– 36].
